import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlaylistSection.module.css' import VideoCard from "../VideoCard/VideoCard"; class PlaylistSection extends React.Component { state = { response : [], } componentDidMount() { axios.get('https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/playlist') .then((response) => { this.setState({ response : response.data }) }) console.log(this.state.response) } render() { console.log(this.props) return(
{this.state.response.map(data => )}
) } } export default PlaylistSection;
